replies.body: Okay so i'm a bit confused, I have brought the (Ryze Icon + Border) But there is no border? I have played Ryze with the icon showing in Loading screen but nothing. I could be totally wrong here and hoping for some help regarding this, Cheers Summoners
Do you own the Championship Ryze skin? The border is for that skin, so it will only show up when you play specifically Championship Ryze, not just Ryze in general.
